alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Kaibab Plateau; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 13 at 3:18AM MST until February 15 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Expect scattered snow showers through the day today. Then, a much more serious storm, containing moderate to heavy snow, strong winds and sharply colder temperatures, arrives Tuesday morning, lasting through Tuesday night. Snow totals of 4 to 10 inches are expected. * WHERE...Areas near Fredonia, Jacob Lake, Prescott, Prescott Valley, Seligman and Valle. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 6 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Snow forecast from 6 AM Tuesday to 6 AM Wednesday: Fredonia 2 to 4 inches Jacob Lake 8 to 12 inches Prescott 3 to 5 inches Prescott Valley 1 to 3 inches Seligman 2 to 4 inches Valle 4 to 6 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Kaibab Plateau; Yavapai County Mountains
